main event: A civilian man observed a formation of strange orange lights hovering in the sky over Truth or Consequences, New Mexico on August 3, 1952.
interesting points: The lights hovered and made formation changes before ascending at rapid speed., The observer estimated the objects were about the size of a jet fighter and located approximately 6 or 7 miles away., The observation lasted for about 9 minutes., The reliability of the observer is considered good., The lights were seen in the vicinity of an airport which has a rotating light beacon.
sighted object: formation of orange lights in the sky
location: Truth or Consequences, New Mexico, United States
witness description: civilian man who is also the airport director
